company.name: Christian Schmidt, Attorney at Law
company.tagline: Immigration Attorney Serving the greater San Francisco Bay Area and beyond
company.description: Boutique Immigration Law Firm specializing in family immigration (green card based on marriage or other family relations) and business immigration including work visas and green cards, investor visas. Having worked as a lawyer for over 20 years, I have helped hundreds of individuals and their families to live and work in the United States and businesses from small start-ups to multinational companies secure work visas and green cards for employees.

hero.headline: Experienced Immigration Attorney serving the San Francisco Bay Area
hero.subheadline: Having worked as a lawyer for over 20 years, I have helped hundreds of individuals and their families to live and work in the United States

about.headline: About Christian Schmidt
about.content: Having worked as a lawyer for over 20 years, I have helped hundreds of individuals and their families to live and work in the United States and businesses from small start-ups to multinational companies secure work visas and green cards for employees. Serving the greater San Francisco Bay Area, my law practice focuses exclusively on U.S. Immigration and Nationality Law. As a boutique immigration law firm, we provide personalized attention to each client's unique immigration needs.

values.title: 20+ Years Experience
values.description: Over two decades of immigration law expertise

values.description: Serving the greater San Francisco Bay Area and beyond
